name: Car Wash Simulator
description:
We all know that a clean car drives better. :)

Car Wash Simulator is racing-simulator game which includes the next jobs: taxi driver & washing sports cars. Over time, the car gets dirty due to dirtyroads. Therefore, you must always keep it clean, because you will not have a request from customers. So, you have to pay close attention at your car.

Good luck with your work and be carefull on the roads.

Game Features :
- 10 levels
- 10 supercars
- Dirty roads, pretentious customers
- Gps
